title: The BET project: Behavior-enabled IoT
abstract: IoT is changing the way Internet is used due to the availability of a large amount of data timely collected from every-day life objects. Designing applications in this new scenario poses new challenges. This extended abstract discusses them and presents the objective of the BeT project whose main aim is to introduce a reference architecture, a conceptual framework, and related techniques to design behavior-enabled IoT systems and applications.
